types.section:
{{fr-noun|m|f=+}}

# {{lb|fr|military|[[Madagascar]]}} Military rank in the navy senior to [[second maître de première classe]] and equal in rank to [[sergent-major]], without exact equivalent in most other Francophone navies; [[second]] [[master]] [[extraordinary]] [[class]]
types.html:
second maître hors classe m (plural seconds maître hors classes, feminine seconde maître hors classe)

  1. (military, Madagascar) Military rank in the navy senior to second maître de première classe and equal in rank to sergent-major, without exact equivalent in most other Francophone navies; second master extraordinary class
trans: Military rank in the navy senior to second maître de première classe and equal in rank to sergent-major, without exact equivalent in most other Francophone navies
